DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: Ford Recalls 1995 Contour , Mercury Mystique : The auto_maker said it recalled the new sedans for the second time in a month and halted production of the cars for a week to accommodate fuel leakage repair . Ford Motor Co . said it will install new fuel tank assemblies in about 28 # 500 of the cars due_to 14 reports of leakage from a plastic fuel tank reinforcement pipe . It said it has not received any reports of fires , accidents or injuries in connection with the problem .
